content: needle 1 place the sts onto needle 2 knit the first 2 3 4 4 sts of needle 1 and slip leg the sts onto needle 2 work the next 27 30 33 36 sts as established for needle 1 in foot continue to work sts on needle 1 i e the and finally knit to the end of needle 1 front of the leg as established work sts on needle 2 as follows k to m1 sm work chart pick up the same number of sts along the right b1 b1 b2 b3 row 21-32 21-32 23-34 25- edge of the heel flap as were picked up along 36 and knit to the end of needle 2 after the left edge place the sts onto needle 2 and finishing chart b1 b1 b2 b3 remove m1 and knit to the end of the needle knitting each knit all sts on needle 2 shadow wrap as one stitch finally slip the last 2 4 4 5 sts of needle 1 onto needle 2 work as described until leg measures there are now 27 30 33 36 sts on needle 1 approximately 4 4 4 5 5 cm / 1½ 1½ 1¾ 2 and 49 52 57 62 sts on needle 2 inches less than the desired final length and you have just finished chart a1 or chart a2 continue to work sts on needle 1 i e the row 30 or 38 on needle 1 front of the leg as established for needle 1 in the foot work a set-up row for each size on to finish the front cable pattern before the needle 2 as follows cuff ribbing work as follows for left and right sock starting at the beginning of needle 1 size xs k7 place m1 ktbl p2 ktbl p2 k23 place m2 p2 ktbl p2 ktbl k7 left sock if you just finished chart a1 row 38 k2 k3 k2 k3 work chart c1 then knit to the size s k9 place m1 ktbl p2 ktbl p2 k23 end of the round if you just finished chart a1 place m2 p2 ktbl p2 ktbl k8 row 30 k2 k3 k2 k3 work chart c2 then knit to the end of the round size m k10 place m1 k1 ktbl/ktbl ctl p3 k25 place m2 p3 ktbl/ktbl ctr k11 right sock if you just finished chart a2 row 38 k12 k15 k18 k21 work chart c2 then size l k12 place m1 ktbl p2 ktbl p2 k27 knit to the end of the round if you just finished place m2 p2 ktbl p2 ktbl k11 chart a2 row 30 k12 k15 k18 k21 work continue to work sts on needle 1 i e the chart c1 then knit to the end of the round front of the leg as established work the heel work as described until you have finished decreases on needle 2 as follows chart c1 or chart c2 row 5 round 1 k to
